column4: Since upgrading to edgy, using Xv at all crashes my X server (hard) to the point where I can't even kill it or get back to a console.  My ctrl-alt-del is still able to get through to reboot the screen, but no video output.  I've got a Radeon XPRESS 200M.  Anyone heard of this issue or know a fix?
weird. I have the same video card, its working absolutely fine for me :\
which driver?  This is happening with both the radeon and firegl drivers.
